text: @TheXbox360nintendo Overworks lives! They merged with Wow Entertainment ( formerly Sega AM1). They released a game that absolutely runs in the same vein as Skies a few years ago. It's called Valkyria Chronicles, and it's for the PS3. A very, very AMAZING JRPG/strategy game. Look it up! Actually, the three main characters of Skies of Arcadia make guest appearances as playable characters~
